subject: re: alternative apostrophe rules
msgSnippet: Hello all, I ve just upload a new version of the Wizard of Oz (malt s international QS spellings) into the texts folder.  In this version I ve changed the
messageBody:
Hello all,

I've just upload a new version of the Wizard of Oz (malt's international QS spellings) into the texts folder.  In this version I've changed the rules I use for aphostrophes.  Basically I'm now using an asterix [*] to indicate possession and ['Zoo] for all contractions of _is_ and _has_ regardless how there sounded.  I would like some feed back to see what you think. (See appendix C in the file for more details of the rules used and examples)

Thanks
Malt
